properties.value: The bronze spear is a two-handed melee weapon made from bronze and is the weakest spear in Old School RuneScape. Spears are members-only weapons. Bronze spears can also be used to create a scarecrow.

The bronze spear is a two-handed melee weapon made from bronze and is the weakest spear in Old School RuneScape. Spears are members-only weapons. Bronze spears can also be used to create a scarecrow.

Bronze spears can be easily obtained from low-level monsters such as goblins. There is a bronze spear spawn in the Haunted Mine on the second level near other assorted bronze equipment. Normal bronze spears are not sold in shops, but a (kp) version can be bought from Tamayu after finishing the Tai Bwo Wannai Trio quest. Using the Smithing skill, players can create bronze spears. However, players must have begun Barbarian Smithing training to be able to smith these spears. It can also be found by digging at Level 3 digging spots at the Digsite, with a specimen brush, specimen jar and trowel in the inventory.

Like all spears, the bronze spear can be poisoned.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
21 April 2021
(update)

The spear's attack speed has been decreased from 6 (every 3.6 seconds) to 4 (every 2.4 seconds).

22 August 2006
(update)
  • The extra strong poisoned variant was renamed from "Bronze spear(+)" to "Bronze spear(p+)".
  • The super strong poisoned variant was renamed from "Bronze spear(s)" to "Bronze spear(p++)".

The '''bronze spear''' is a two-handed [[melee weapon]] made from [[bronze equipment|bronze]] and is the weakest [[spear]] in ''[[Old School RuneScape]]''. Spears are [[members]]-only weapons. Bronze spears can also be used to create a [[scarecrow]].

Bronze spears can be easily obtained from low-level monsters such as [[Goblin|goblins]]. There is a bronze spear spawn in the [[Abandoned Mine|Haunted Mine]] on the second level near other assorted bronze equipment. Normal bronze spears are not sold in shops, but a (kp) version can be bought from [[Tamayu]] after finishing the [[Tai Bwo Wannai Trio]] quest. Using the [[Smithing]] skill, players can create bronze spears. However, players must have begun [[Barbarian Smithing]] training to be able to smith these spears. It can also be found by digging at Level 3 digging spots at the [[Digsite]], with a [[specimen brush]], [[specimen jar]] and [[trowel]] in the inventory.

Like all spears, the bronze spear can be [[poison]]ed.
